5132789607301135.original:
小红书开源了其最新语音识别模型：FireRedASR，擅长识别中英文、方言/歌词，在公共普通话ASR基准测试中达到了新的最佳水平

两种架构设计，LLM版，8.3B参数，高识别准确率，支持无缝的端到端语音交互，适合高质量语音转写

AED版， 1.1B参数，可以平衡性能和效率，适合普通应用场景

github： ...全文
5132789607301135.processed:
Xiaohongshu has open-sourced its latest speech recognition model: FireRedASR, which is good at recognizing Chinese and English, dialects/lyrics, achieving a new best level in the public Mandarin ASR benchmark test.

There are two architecture designs, LLM version with 8.3B parameters, high recognition accuracy, supporting seamless end-to-end voice interaction, suitable for high-quality voice transcription.

AED version with 1.1B parameters, can balance performance and efficiency, suitable for general application scenarios.

github: ... github： ...
5132789607301135.refined_with_url: Xiaohongshu has open-sourced its latest speech recognition model: FireRedASR, which is good at recognizing Chinese and English, dialects/lyrics, achieving a new best level in the public Mandarin ASR benchmark test. There are two architecture designs, LLM version with 8.3B parameters, high recognition accuracy, supporting seamless end-to-end voice interaction, suitable for high-quality voice transcription. AED version with 1.1B parameters, can balance performance and efficiency, suitable for general application scenarios. GitHub: /status/5132789607301135

清华和卡内基梅隆大学开源了一个智能爬虫系统：Crawl4LLM
以前爬100个网页，现在爬21个就能达到同样效果，效率提高了近5倍

Crawl4LLM根据网页对LLM预训练的影响力来选择要爬取的网页，先评估哪些网页更有价值，对训练模型更有帮助，优先抓取高价值网页

支持三种爬取模式，Crawl4LLM模式、随机爬取、 ...全文
5136172198396279.processed: Tsinghua University and Carnegie Mellon University have open-sourced an intelligent crawler system: Crawl4LLM. Previously you needed to crawl 100 pages, now with 21 pages you can achieve the same effect, increasing efficiency by nearly 5 times. Crawl4LLM selects the pages to crawl based on their influence on pre-training LLMs, evaluating which pages are more valuable and more helpful for training models, prioritizing high-value pages. It supports three crawling modes: Crawl4LLM mode, random crawls, ... /status/5136172198396279

A real-time 2D virtual avatar model driven by audio: LiteAvatar
Only uses CPU to generate facial animations at 30fps, suitable for real-time 2D video chats and other scenarios.

Lip sync prediction model generates synchronized lip movements based on audio features.
Lightweight and can be used on mobile devices.

5138250295936324.original:
In recent years, there has been talk about large models replacing jobs. It is true, large models are currently like temporary outsourcing; they can likely perform at mid-to-high levels in many areas, but they also have the characteristic of "being strong when facing strong tasks and weak when facing weak tasks" —\u00b is your job something that can be handled just by temporary outsourcing? 

Moreover, and most importantly, large models can produce a vast amount of content, present across various social media and websites, but who is going to curate, verify, and consume it? 

Curating topics may be more important now than ever before.

5138624175670695.original:
大模型自动化写代码构想：写好需求后，提前写好“测试集”跟“验收集”，大模型写好代码后，自己机器跑一遍，测试集的错误案例会完整发给大模型，让它改正；验收集只会给出正确率

测试集、验收集都能设置正确率，达到就通过。模型尝试8次（或许也应当可以设置？）后扔不达标，就停止
5138624175670695.processed:
Concept of using large models to automate coding: After writing the requirements, prepare the "test set" and "acceptance set" in advance. Once the large model has finished writing the code, run it on your own machine. The error cases from the test set will be fully given to the large model for it to correct; the acceptance set will only provide accuracy rates.

Both the test set and acceptance set can have accuracy rates set, passing when the threshold is reached. If the model attempts 8 times (perhaps this can also be set?) and still doesn't meet the standard, it stops.
5138624175670695.refined_with_url: Concept of using large models to automate coding: After writing the requirements, prepare the "test set" and "acceptance set" in advance. Once the large model has finished writing the code, run it on your own machine. The error cases from the test set will be fully given to the large model for it to correct; the acceptance set will only provide accuracy rates. Both the test set and acceptance set can have accuracy rates set, passing when the threshold is reached. If the model attempts 8 times (perhaps this can also be set?) and still doesn't meet the standard, it stops.

谷歌貌似要出Deep Research的升级版！

5141190014668085.processed:
The most common request for AI search recently: English search, Chinese answers, no news. 

Lastly, if there are link restriction features, you can refine it, such as restricting Bilibili links for game guides or limiting github.com and ietf.org through network protocol and implementation. If you want to search for a topic but don't know which websites are reliable, you can ask AI first.

5142196588120810.original:
一图看清 ChatGPT 不同模型和订阅之间的差别

- GPT-4o 是目前功能最全面的模型。
- GPT-4.5 紧随其后，可能是因为它与 GPT-4o 存在很多相似的机制。
- 推理（Reasoning）类的模型特别不一致，各种功能的开启情况也比较随机。
- 目前自定义 GPT（Custom GPT）功能只能使用 GPT-4o。
5142196588120810.processed:
A diagram to understand the differences between various ChatGPT models and subscriptions:

- GPT-4o is currently the most comprehensive model.
- GPT-4.5 comes next, possibly due to its similar mechanisms with GPT-4o.
- Reasoning models are particularly inconsistent, with feature activation varying randomly.
- Currently, Custom GPT features can only use GPT-4o.
5142196588120810.refined_with_url:
A diagram to understand the differences between various ChatGPT models and subscriptions:

- GPT-4o is currently the most comprehensive model.
- GPT-4.5 comes next, possibly due to its similar mechanisms with GPT-4o.
- Reasoning models are particularly inconsistent, with feature activation varying randomly.
- Currently, Custom GPT features can only use GPT-4o.

一个为Qdrant构建的MCP服务项目：mcp-server-qdrant，实现AI与Qdrant数据库无缝对接

支持基于语义的存储和检索，适用于多种场景，比如代码片段管理、知识库检索等

支持多种运行方式和传输协议，适配远程和本地客户端

支持与Cursor等工具集成，用于代码搜索和语义检索

github：网页链接 ...全文
5144200874819725.processed:
A project for an MCP service built for Qdrant: mcp-server-qdrant, enabling seamless integration of AI with the Qdrant database.

Supports semantic-based storage and retrieval, suitable for various scenarios such as code snippet management, knowledge base retrieval, etc.

Supports multiple operating methods and transmission protocols, adapting to remote and local clients.

Supports integration with tools like Cursor for code search and semantic search.

github:

5144958971154090.original:
氛围感编程（Vibe coding）是指，全靠AI编程，甚至只要动动嘴，代码就实现完了，但由于不熟悉代码，遇到错误也只能交由AI更改，随机抽取正确答案——听起来很像组长分派任务给手下几个程序员

名称由计算机科学家 Andrej Karpathy 首次提出（图一） #AI创造营#
5144958971154090.processed:
Vibe coding refers to relying entirely on AI for programming, where you just need to say what you want, and the code is completed. However, due to a lack of familiarity with the code, when errors occur, only AI can be asked to make changes, randomly selecting the correct answer—it sounds very much like a leader assigning tasks to several programmers.

The term was first proposed by computer scientist Andrej Karpathy (Picture 1). /search?containerid=231522type%3D1%26t%3D10%26q%3D%23AI%E5%88%9B%E9%80%A0%E8%90%A5%23
5144958971154090.refined_with_url: Vibe coding refers to relying entirely on AI for programming, where you just need to say what you want, and the code is completed. However, due to a lack of familiarity with the code, when errors occur, only AI can be asked to make changes, randomly selecting the correct answer—it sounds very much like a leader assigning tasks to several programmers. The term was first proposed by computer scientist Andrej Karpathy (Picture 1). https://m.weibo.cn/search?containerid=231522type%3D1%26t%3D10%26q%3D%23AI%E5%88%9B%E9%80%A0%E8%90%A5%23

5154595548168250.processed: Valuable testing, my experience is: 1. Use a good model; 2. Be as concise as possible, keep only the necessary context and instructions; 3. Choose a model you like and generate multiple times, adjust the prompts as needed based on the results, and usually after trying several times you can get a concise and stable result. 1034:4567abcd
5154595548168250.refined_with_url: Valuable testing, my experience is: 1. Use a good model; 2. Be as concise as possible, keep only the necessary context and instructions; 3. 最近思考的一类问题：
1️⃣算力与水力、电力与网络带宽这类资源类似吗？如果是，是否可能推出算力会成为另一种基础资源
2️⃣电力大规模应用的时候，相关理论是“白盒”状态，还是“黑盒”（不懂，但是用起来再说）
5155754722464543.processed: Recently I've been thinking about a type of problem: 1️⃣ Is computing power similar to resources like water power, electricity, and network bandwidth? 5162545354643682.processed: When there is a clock in the room, you know exactly what time it is, but when there are two or three clocks showing different times, you’ll get confused! So, with AI, you should just use the best model for the task at hand. Of course, if you are a professional at this task, it’s not a problem because you can distinguish between good and bad, but if you're not, having multiple AIs will only confuse you! somepath
5162545354643682.refined_with_url: When there is a clock in the room, you know exactly what time it is, but when there are two or three clocks showing different times, you’ll get confused! Of course, if you are a professional at this task, it’s not a problem because you can distinguish between good and bad, but if you're not, having multiple AIs will only confuse you!

5168867926088813.original:
jules.google 补了一些单元测试，原先四十多个，现在129个，改了两次还错四十多个，现在改第三次，错10个，看起来还好，不过问题是它把原先的单元测试改错了——这一般暗示着更深层次的问题，也就是它之前写的代码其实不太可信，需要仔细检查

这样就比自己写更痛苦了
5168867926088813.processed: jules.google added some unit tests, originally there were more than forty, now there are 129. After changing twice, there are still more than forty errors. Now, after the third change, there are 10 errors, which doesn't look too bad. However, the problem is that it altered the original unit tests incorrectly—this generally implies a deeper issue, meaning that the code written before is not very reliable and needs careful examination. This is more painful than writing it myself.
5168867926088813.refined_with_url: jules.google added some unit tests, originally there were more than forty, now there are 129. After changing twice, there are still more than forty errors. Now, after the third change, there are 10 errors, which doesn't look too bad. However, the problem is that it altered the original unit tests incorrectly—this generally implies a deeper issue, meaning that the code written before is not very reliable and needs careful examination. This is more painful than writing it myself.
